website_summaries.verdict: There's no better way to test out the most powerful Xbox ever made than by exploring one of the most popular franchises on the console.
pros: Includes five games in the Gears franchise for download
Xbox One X with 1TB of internal storage
Includes a black Xbox Wireless Controller
Features free trials for Xbox Live and Xbox Game Pass
cons: Not the best starting bundle if you aren’t already a fan of the franchise, but you’ll definitely find something you’ll appreciate on Xbox Game Pass

customer_reviews.title: Box opened and resealed
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Xbox one X and it appears it had been opened and resealed. You can see where someone cut the stickers holding the box shut on both sides then put new stickers over the top. I’m a little disappointed right now......
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Nawrot

customer_reviews.title: Original factory seal broken, used outer box
customer_reviews.text: Outside box seems old and previously used. Inner box was obviously opened and didn’t even try to make it look like it was ever sealed... haven’t taken console out of box yet, wondering if I should return it?
customer_reviews.author: Don A

customer_reviews.title: Unable redeem Xbox all access
customer_reviews.text: There is no option to redeem the 24 month xbox all access. After 40 minutes on the phone with microsoft tech support and then another hour with Amazon chat, the issue is still not resolved. The actual xbox setup was a breeze but the option to redeem all access by clicking on the "included with this xbox" does not exist on my console. Others have had the same issue as me. What a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Cain W.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of preopened items
customer_reviews.text: Beware the box looked like it had been opened already and the corner of box was smashed up like item had been dropped.
customer_reviews.author: mrsyanez

customer_reviews.title: What shape it was in when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Received this item today and it is clear it has been opened and resealed, the box is torn, not sure if the game is in working order or not. It is a Christmas present, if it is broken I wanted to put this out there to let you know what shape it was in when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: DC Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent System
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this Xbox, I love it. Very quiet system. Very easy to transfer my account and games from the original Xbox One to the new X. Clear picture, great graphics and runs perfect, no problems at all. Looks good on any TV/Monitor. I do not have a 4K TV but even on a 1080p 144Hz monitor everything looks great. Also for this package you get all of the Gears of War games. 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Meissner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has always used this console, I wasn’t disappointed. I have used Microsoft’s older predecessors of the console and will continue to use it. The video quality is great. The games included are great. If there is anything I would like to improve the console is more memory. I know 1 TB is a lot but not so much when it comes to wanting to have multiple games. I would also like it more if you didn’t have to install each game you want to play. But maybe in the future they can make that optional.
customer_reviews.author: Lizettegue

customer_reviews.title: Works great when the controller stays synced
customer_reviews.text: I like the picture quality that it provides on streaming platforms. I dislike that I have to constantly reconnect the controller to the xbox. I'm not sure if this purchase is worth the money when microsoft is having such annoying issues with controllers. I have called microsoft and it will reconnect after a reset but will disconnect randomly and they state that this can be normal.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Birrueta

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first xbox that I own not the first time user of one. I really like that the update on it while setting it up makes it look more organized. Not the same as my son but I like it. Would recommend it to anyone. I was kinda worried that it would be preopened due to the comments but it looked like it has never been opened. The box it was shipped in was not damged so that was a huge weight off my shoulders. I have only played it once due to the games I wanted are still being downloaded, very slow internet in my area. Still worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Solid upgrade over the One S
customer_reviews.text: The Xbox One X is a good upgrade over the One S. The graphics are sharper and the load times are a lot faster. The 1TB hard drive is large enough to install my games without needing an external hard drive. The processor and graphics cards have been beefed up and the One X supports native 4K resolution. All around a better machine, it may be enough for me to not want to upgrade to the Xbox Series X this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bort

customer_reviews.title: Super happy
customer_reviews.text: Beyond satisfied with my purchase. The one thing that had me nervous was the fact that many reviewers stated that there box was opened. Upon receiving and investigating I was able to piece together that box was opened to replace/add in the Gears of War freebies as this seems to be a standard Xbox One X, just with those extras, wrapped in a new sheath that features the Gears of War promotion. Everything inside was factory sealed, and I have had no issue with this (other than the system taking up a lot of my time!). Very happy I decided to be an equal opportunity gamer and bring home a current gen Xbox to the family.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Matt

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft all the way.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy.....I only bought this because my girlfriend went out and rented one off of Rent A Center. I immediately told her she was a dork telling her to look at the contract. Here she was paying 700 dollars "if" she paid it off in three months. Meanwhile in the ballpark of 1k if she didn't, for a used roughed up piece of junk. This is new. Hundreds cheaper. And comes with a bunch of codes.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as used - very good. The system looked brand new out of the box. No scratches or dents. The controller felt great with no signs of wear. everything that was supposed t be in the box was present. Nothing was missing. The codes for the game worked and we were and running in no time! I would recommend this t a friend or family member!
customer_reviews.author: jonnyBOLD

customer_reviews.title: Awful Microsoft product
customer_reviews.text: Crippled user OS interface and settings options. OS updates routinely interrupt and delay use. Can't turn off marketing and ads on desktop. Mediocre graphics performance. Box runs hotter than expected for the hardware performance. And in the year 2020 with custom Microsoft hardware and locked down OS, games *still* GPF and die. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not 100% backwards compatible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother as a Christmas present and my brother doesn't know that much about xbox one console's and thought maybe backwards compatible but told him it only has a few games listed, he wanted to play some xbox original games but is not listed as compatible so he is stuck with some xbox 360 games(if he buys some) and xbox one games.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Knight

customer_reviews.title: Turned out good for me.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was good and all. Clean, it's definitely new. The codes for the gears games come in an enclosed envelope that can't be opened and resealed, least without notice. It's all heavy duty equipment, for the sleek size of this Xbox it's heavy. I noticed some people have said that it's pre-opened and what not. Codes don't work. Etc. If it's opened and resealed that's not always a bad thing good to have a tested open package than one that's not and is broken. As for the codes, I'm sure some are redeemed by people and what not you can't always expect good from any business. But my experience has turned out great. I'd definitely recommend this console.
customer_reviews.author: Xemnith7

customer_reviews.title: The Performance is Overwhelmingly Great
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular quality for a fair price! Impressed with its performance. Now that I’m able to run native 4K, games such as Modern Warfare (2019) are phenomenal and the visual quality has truly transcended. Would additionally recommend using it with a 4K TV and sound bar/a good gaming headset; really boosts the whole experience for gaming or streaming Netflix!
customer_reviews.author: Justice Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Things have changed. Not for the better.
customer_reviews.text: Nice game console. Having to download games on hard drive kinda sucks 1tb can only hold about 11 games now days. Takes a day of downloading to start playing.
customer_reviews.author: MikeR

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Everything appears to be unscratched and in full working order, no issues with any of the DLCs or set up besides the hardware not initially restarting after downloading all my games onto it, but eventually it was able to restart and react normally. The original packaging was clearly damaged from a previous owner opening the box roughly but everything inside was in working order so I am a happy customer! Definitely the best deal that I’ve been able to find
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: ATTENTION: To all that purchase this!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received item today and upon opening, the factory stickers were cut and replaced with new stickers over the original ones. This item was opened prior to arrival and was not sold as a return or open box. Very disappointed and suggest all to exam your packages from this order carefully upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Davis

customer_reviews.title: We were skeptical at first but very happy we purchased! Great product for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: The Xbox One X I purchased for my husband is great so far. We give it 4 stars only because technically it is outdated since there is a new console coming out later this year. The delivery was right on schedule, the price was less the buying at any local store and most of all it was not defective. All parts were included and we are now comfortably gaming with the desired 4k experience we had before his previous console malfunctioned. We are very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Leavens

customer_reviews.title: TV signal skips
customer_reviews.text: Only use the console for streaming Netflix, Disney etc with occasional old person game. However the picture which is very high quality ‘skips’ about once every minute or two. It’s very annoying and I will be calling for help today.
customer_reviews.author: Mick O

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I love it! I am a avid gamer, and use this everyday. It's absolutely the best deal in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmine

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, but I'm used to PC games and getting used the the XBox controller is a real challenge for old hands.
customer_reviews.author: Family Hunter

customer_reviews.title: It was a new Xbox..
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what everyone is bitching about. Xbox was brand new. Unopened box. New console and new controller. Whoever says different is wrong. Don’t let bad reviews mislead you. You are getting what you pay for... a new xbox.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter and she LOVED it! Came with everything and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Beware - NOT NEW!
customer_reviews.text: Item is labeled as "New" but I received a "Used" item. The box had already been opened, the console has scratches on it, and the remote control showed signs of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Galley

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it’s me. But I highly doubt it. Watch video. Help me.
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully someone from Microsoft or here can help me. I didn’t have a problem with the Xbox One S doing updates. Wanted an upgrade. Apparently they don’t want my business. This is Xb1X NUMBER 2 because amazon sent me a replacement due to the same issue. But this time the update doesn’t pass 90% when the first one was at 97%. This. Sucks. Completely.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Controller doesn’t recharge?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Controller isn’t rechargeable. I don’t know how cheep they are trying to be. You have to “purchase” a separate kit to recharge the controller.
customer_reviews.author: David Machart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome value all 5 gears games for 300 and Xbox one x deal
customer_reviews.author: Kunark38

customer_reviews.title: Great Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Box was previously opened and sealed shut again but nothing inside the box was unwrapped or look like it had be tampered with. Easy to set up and has been running like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Product looks brand new. Was packaged as if it were bought straight from a store. No scratches on the Xbox or controller. Everything runs smoothly as it should. Great buy at a great price! If you’re a true gamer you can absolutely tell how much more powerful this system is than the previous one’s.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Lasalle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my brother, he opened it and try to play one of the games he got and the console won’t read disks. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Box resealed multiple times
customer_reviews.text: The box came in all busted and ripped up. Been resealed multiple times. Console and codes work perfectly tho which subsided me giving the state of the box. Giving it a 2 stars because it works at least
customer_reviews.author: jacob beiser

customer_reviews.title: Console
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game console for my son for Christmas! He loves it. He had a box one that worked great but some of the newer games would glitch or kick him off. The Xbox One X works great with those games.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: forward thinking
customer_reviews.text: NICE! All games are digital and easy to store and use without changing discs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: On time works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: ordered, arrived on time no damage and works perfectly fine!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Nall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent xbox
customer_reviews.text: Dosen't even look like its been played but 10 times. Beyond thankful for this amazing product. Shipping came 1 day early ive been updating all my stuff and have had no problems. Even the controller looks new!
customer_reviews.author: Michael johnston

customer_reviews.title: Best Console Out!!
customer_reviews.text: For $350 with 5 games you literally cannot find a better value in console gaming! This will definitely hold me over until the Series X later this year.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetech28

customer_reviews.title: Not new box.
customer_reviews.text: The Xbox one x I purchased has been previously been opened multiple times. Not sure how I feel about paying for an new item and receiving something that’s been open or refurbished.

product_meta.title: Xbox One X 1TB Console - Gears 5 Bundle
product_meta.description:
Edition:X 1TB - Gears 5 Bundle

Own the Xbox One X Gears 5 Bundle and experience an epic campaign and brutal action across five thrilling modes. Join Kait Diaz on her journey to uncover her connection to the enemy and the true danger to sera - herself. This bundle includes an Xbox One X; a full-game download of Gears 5; A full-game download of Gears of War: ultimate Edition; full-game downloads of Gears of War 2, 3, and 4; A month trial of Xbox Game Pass; month of Xbox Live Gold; and an Xbox wireless Controller. With 40% more power than any other Console, a library of over 2200 games, and true 4K gaming, games play better and are more immersive on Xbox One X.

If purchased through Xbox All Access, the bundle includes 24-month subscription to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate includes Xbox Live Gold, Xbox Game Pass for Console, Xbox Game Pass for PC, and other benefits; game catalog varies over time. Internet access required (ISP fees apply). Membership conversion: your existing Xbox Live Gold and Xbox Game Pass membership(s) will automatically convert to Ultimate at a conversion ratio, learn more xbox.com/gamepass. Digital Direct: Your 24-month Xbox Game Pass Ultimate membership is delivered directly to your console during set-up and is available in Settings; no codes required. Warranty: console is under a 1 year limited hardware warranty (90 days for controller/accessories) regardless of length of financing. (Microsoft Limited Hardware Warranty: https://support.microsoft.com/warranty). Upgrade: Upgrade option after the equivalent of 18 payments for the next Xbox console only, coming Holiday 2020 (excludes Xbox One X, S, and S All Digital Edition). New contract, terms, and pricing apply. Requires return of console in good condition. The next Xbox console available under the upgrade option is subject to FCC rules and will comply with the appropriate FCC rules when available. See product and upgrade terms at Xbox.com/XboxAllAccessTerms.

With approval of Citizens One Line of Credit at 0% APR and 24-month term. Subject to individual credit approval. Total payment amount from $839.76; taxes, shipping, and other charges are extra and may vary (estimated retail price with Xbox One X console; prices will vary by console and retailer). See Citizens One Line of Credit Agreement at https://www.citizensone.com/XAA for full terms and conditions.
